import { Component } from 'react' class SignUpForm extends Component { state = { firstName: '', lastName: '', gender: '', country: '', likesPineapple: false, likesLiquorice: false, } handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(this.state) } handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value, checked, type } = event.target if(type === 'checkbox') { this.setState({ [name]: checked }) } else { this.setState({ [name]: value }) } } render() { return (




) } } export default SignUpForm
